metadata.name: Control Button Demo (Ready)
metadata.description: Environment for control button demonstration with agents in ready positions. Human at (2,3) between buttons, robot at (4,3) facing east. Buttons are pre-programmed: upper=left, right=forward, lower=right.
metadata.author: EMPO Framework
